quotes.text: and WHATEVER IT IS U CAN DO IT I PROMISE !!!!!!!
i know you've been through so much
but there is so much love as well.
to be able to love is a BRAVE thing
you do not always have to do everything by yourself.
there is nothing wrong with letting those who love you help you.
some people are going to judge you based on little things.
please don't let them get to you !!!!
you are a COMPLEX and INCREDIBLE PERSON !!!!!!
what do they know about you ???
you are SO MUCH more than they think !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
things are tough for you right now
but it won't always be this hard
everything is going to be ok. you'll get through this !!!
please don't be angry or give up because you aren't perfect at something.
